short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button for easily copying formatted code snippets from stackoverflow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When on a stack overflow page with answers, this extension adds a 'Copy' button for each code block to enable easy copying of formatted snippets.
